naslov: Kamena kuća s 3 apartmana, 100 m od mora – Preko, otok Ugljan (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Renovirana kamena kuća s 3 apartmana – Preko, otok Ugljan – 100 m od plaže Prodaje se autentična kamena kuća u centru mjesta Preko na Ugljanu, svega 100 m od mora i svih sadržaja. Nekretnina je potpuno renovirana pod stručnim nadzorom arhitektonskog ureda, s novim instalacijama, podovima i opremom, te se prodaje namještena i spremna za korištenje. Sastoji se od 3 odvojena apartmana: > Trosobni apartman (1. kat) – 2 spavaće sobe, 2 kupaonice, kuhinja, blagovaonica; mogućnost nadogradnje potkrovlja ili krovne terase > Jednosobni apartman (prizemlje) – izlaz u dvorište s roštiljem > Studio apartman (prizemlje) – također s direktnim pristupom dvorištu Grijanje: peć na kruta goriva Hlađenje: klima uređaji Zvučna izolacija, kvalitetni materijali, spoj tradicionalnog i modernog Mogućnost turističkog najma – odlična investicija Uređeno i ograđeno dvorište s komin roštiljem Trajektna veza sa Zadrom svakih 30 min Lokacija: mirna ulica, blizina plaže, trgovina, restorana i pristaništa KONTAKT : +385 91 9343 658 (molimo bez agencija) Cijena: na upit Dokumentacija uredna Za dodatne informacije ili dogovor o razgledavanju, slobodno nas kontaktirajte. Ovo je rijetka prilika za posjedovanje dijela autentične Dalmacije, savršeno prilagođene za opuštanje i investiciju. ENG ________________________________________________________________________________ Charming Renovated Stone House with 3 Apartments – Preko, Ugljan Island – 100m from the Beach A fully renovated traditional stone house for sale, located in the center of Preko on the island of Ugljan, just 100 meters from the beach and all essential amenities. This unique property consists of three separate, fully equipped apartments, each with a private entrance, making it ideal for tourism rental, a family holiday home, or a combination of both. The property includes: Spacious 2-bedroom apartment on the first floor with 2 bathrooms, kitchen, dining area, and access to the attic (ideal for conversion into a rooftop terrace or additional living space) 1-bedroom apartment on the ground floor with access to a private courtyard featuring a traditional stone grill Studio apartment with a kitchenette and bathroom, also with direct access to the courtyard Renovation carried out under the supervision of a renowned architectural studio from Zagreb High-quality wooden floors with sound insulation Heating: solid fuel stove | Cooling: air conditioning Authentic Mediterranean charm combined with modern comfort Peaceful courtyard with olive and citrus trees – rare atmosphere hard to replicate in modern buildings Property is sold fully furnished and move-in ready All units are equipped with Wi-Fi, modern kitchens, and appliances Excellent location – walking distance to shops, restaurants, marina, and beach Frequent ferry and boat connections to Zadar (every 30 minutes) Clean documentation Price: on request For further information or to schedule a viewing, feel free to contact us. This is a rare opportunity to own a piece of authentic Dalmatia, perfectly tailored for both relaxation and investment.
